title: Creativity & Style
description: Can the model generate text that is engaging, original, and matches your desired tone (e.g., formal, witty, technical)?

title: Coherence
description: Does the generated text flow logically and stay on topic, especially in longer pieces of content?

title: Instruction Following
description: How well does the model adhere to complex instructions, constraints, and formatting requirements in your prompt?

title: Factuality
description: For non-fiction content, it's crucial to verify the model's outputs, as even the best models can 'hallucinate' facts.
